nodes.text: Showers were washing facilities that could be found in most buildings. They were equipped with jets to distribute the water. Showers could also be adjusted to control the temperature. While an Imperial cadet, Zare Leonis used the showers at the Lothal Imperial Academy to clean himself after completing a field running exercise.[source?] Y-45 armored transport haulers were equipped with a shower stall. One AT-hauler's shower was once used simultaneously by Imperial defector Han Solo and the Wookiee Chewbacca, to Solo's mild annoyance.
